column3:
@fanquake I've checked the travis error, but I'm confused what the error means:

```
FAIL: subtree directory was touched without subtree merge
```
Subtrees need to be updated upstream. Please refer to the markdown docs in this repo
@MarcoFalke I see, is there a reason why these are not loaded as submodules?
I think they are the same (c.f. https://stackoverflow.com/a/35549033/2084795)
